text:
-siq sA mA# jinva || 
madhuq vAtA# RutAyaqtE madhu# kSharantiq sindhava#H | 
mAddhvI$rnaH saqntvOSha#dhIH || 
madhuq nakta#muqtOShasiq madhu#maqt pArthi#vaq(gm)q raja#H | 
madhuq dyaura#stu naH piqtA || 
madhu#mAn nOq vanaqspatiq-rmadhu#mA(gm) astuq sUrya#H | 
mAddhvIqrgAvO# Bavantu naH || 
maqhI dyauH pRu#thiqvI ca# na iqmaM ~Myaqj~jaM mi#mikShatAM | 
piqpRuqtAM nOq BarI#maBiH || 
tad-viShNO$H paraqmaM - [  ] 38
